item.title: Pharmacies Demand Payback for COVID Booking Errors
item.description: Pharmacy leaders in England are calling for millions in compensation after NHS booking failures left staff facing abuse and wasted time. Medscape News...

item.title: England Backs Wider Use of Abiraterone for Prostate Cancer
item.description: Thousands of men with high-risk prostate cancer that has not spread will gain access to abiraterone after NHS England approved its wider use. Medscape...

item.title: Postnatal Care in UK ‘Failing Women’, Report Warns
item.description: A survey of parents finds widespread loneliness, poor access to care, and safety fears in the weeks and months after birth. Press Association
